title: Interpretation of seeing the president in a dream

preview.html: Seeing the president in a dream and talking to him If a married woman sees the head of state in her dream, this indicates great sustenance, abundant wealth and lawful money. Seeing her sitting next to the president in a dream for a married woman is evidence of the stability of her marital life. If a married woman sees in her dream that she is shaking hands with the ruler or the president, this indicates that desires will soon be fulfilled. If women see that the president shakes hands with her husband and talks to him and her husband shakes hands with the president indicates the high status that her husband enjoys and his position. It also indicates a higher standard of living and a higher position at work. Seeing the president of a foreign country in a dream If the dreamer sees in a dream that the leader of another country has entrusted him with its affairs. This vision bodes well for a high position and the achievement of ambitions. If the monarch suffers from a certain disease, he sees this vision. Good news that he will recover soon, God willing. But if the dreamer sees that the president is smiling at him in a dream, this is an expression of success and success in the life of that dreamer. It also indicates that he will obtain a high position and will get a lot of money soon. Seeing Turkish President Erdogan in a dream This dream indicates that the dreamer will rise In status and changes for the better and removes his worries. And if one sees in a dream, a president If he is removed from his position, this means that the visionary suffers from many difficult problems in his life, especially in his professional life. But if he sees in a dream that this president is severely rebuking him and accusing him. That is, there are some competitors and rivals for the one who sees him, but he will overcome them and raise his status. Seeing the dead president in a dream and talking to him If a person sees, whether male or female, a president, a dead state, may God bless him and grant him peace. This indicates the urgent journey of the future person. This vision also indicates that the dreamer will obtain abundant and lawful money. Imam Ibn Sirin believes that the president actually died, indicating that the seer obtained money that he did not plan for. If the dreamer sees that he kills the head of state, this indicates the great change that will occur in this person's life for the better. It also indicates that he will achieve a goal that he did not have much time to try to achieve. Seeing a foreign president in a dream If a person sees that the foreign president takes money and gifts from people. It indicates happiness and good things to come and the achievement of all goals. Ibn Sirin believes that if one sees In a dream, a president or a king whom no one knows, he invites him to meet him. This means death for the visionary, considering that the kingship belongs to God alone. If one sees in a dream that the president has bones growing on his head, this means raising the prestige and power of this leader. As for seeing the foreign president blind, this indicates that this president is not interested in the affairs of his subjects and does not care about their problems. Seeing the deceased president in a dream Imam Ibn Shaheen says that this vision contains a lot of good for the one who sees it and that it contains a lot of food and money. But if someone sees the head of the grave in a dream, this means that the dreamer is about to achieve his dreams and desires

title: Interpretation of a dream about riding a bike with someone in a dream according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html:
Seeing yourself riding a bike with someone in a dream means happiness, success and other interpretations. We will explain this to a single girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, or a man, such as riding a bike with a lover or husband, riding a bike with a dead person, or riding a black motorcycle for a son.
Sirin, and others in a continuum. Issue: Interpretation of riding a bicycle with someone in a dream Riding a bicycle with someone in a dream, and the person was known to the dreamer and those close to him in life, is evidence that life will soon be renewed and that the dreamer will gain happiness and goodness in all matters of public life, and it also indicates the dreamerâ€™s success in his work and acquisitions. Of money. Riding a bike with a friend of the dreamer, is evidence that the dreamer will succeed well and achieve a lot in the next stage, because it indicates his livelihood. Seeing an unmarried woman riding a bike and a stranger sitting behind her in a dream is evidence that she will meet new people soon and will grow up A very strong friendship between them, if the bike is traveling on a quiet road. Seeing a single woman riding a bike and someone she knows in life behind her is evidence that she will establish an emotional relationship with the same person in life and continue in the near future and will enjoy happiness and kindness. The familiar face sitting behind A single woman in her dream while riding a bike is evidence that she will be emotionally attached to the same person and will marry him soon. Seeing a bike in a dream is evidence that the dreamer will get into trouble in public life, if he fails to ride a bike properly. Riding a bike in a dream for a pregnant woman indicates It also indicates that she will soon give birth to a female, while in the event that a pregnant woman sees herself riding a bicycle and walking on the road with great difficulty, this is evidence that she will give birth. She gives birth with difficulty and suffers. Riding a bicycle in a dream suggests that the dreamer will obtain goodness and happiness in the near future, and it also indicates a change in his circumstances for the better. Interpretation of cycling in a dream Riding a bicycle in a dream and the dreamer is walking with steady steps without any obstacles in his way, is evidence that The dreamer is on the right path in his life and making the right decisions, while in one case he was not in a position to control the bike, evidence that he is making many wrong decisions. Riding a light-colored bike in a dream also indicates that the dreamer will be able To overcome sadness and achieve happiness in the near future. Riding a bike in a dream and the color red indicates that the dreamer will succeed in winning love and will live in a state of romance and happiness in general life. Seeing the dreamer riding a bike carefully and avoiding all obstacles and bumps on the road is evidence that the dreamer He will be able to think deeply, as he will achieve many advantages in his work and will be able to face the most difficult situations and achieve balance. Interpretation of riding a bike in a dream: Seeing a single man riding a bike in a dream is evidence that he will get married and succeed in being a family man and will be very successful in his neighborhood.

title: Interpretation of a dream about combing hair

preview.html: It also indicates the upcoming joy and overwhelming happiness in which the dreamer or dreamer lives, and the dream indicates a new job and abundant sustenance in his life, God willing. The interpretation of seeing a hair dryer in a dream for a single girl, as well as seeing an unmarried woman cutting her hair in a dream while she is engaged and suffering from some crises. It indicates This vision indicates that he has finished with these crises and that he will prepare in the next season for marriage. The unmarried woman who sees in a dream a stranger combing her hair and was happy with him. Ibn Sirin interpreted the dream as meaning that she will meet someone in her life and get engaged to him. There is also that woman who looks at the hair dryer. She wants to style her hair with it. It indicates that she is trying to put an end to the bad things she is experiencing and experiencing in her current era. Imam Al-Sadiq said that an unmarried woman sees herself in a dream combing her hair with a dryer. It indicates joy in her life and future happiness for her and her family if she does that in her home in a dream. See also: Interpretation of dreams about cutting long hair. Interpretation of seeing hair drying in a dream for a married woman. It is said that a married woman looks in a dream at her husband combing her hair with a hair dryer. This indicates that she will live with him happily, as Ibn Sirin said in this interpretation. Either the married woman who asks for... An unknown person in a dream dreams that she combs her hair with a hairdryer. Imam Al-Sadiq explained that she will live a good, happy life, full of abundant goodness. And if a married woman is looking for a hairdryer in her dream, she combs her hair. Here the vision expresses that it will end the crises that he was going through or was experiencing. But a married woman looks at an unknown person in a dream, combing her hair with a hairdryer. This vision shows that he achieved what he was trying to achieve in the coming period, God willing. Interpretation of seeing a hairdryer in a dream for a divorced woman: The divorced woman who asks a stranger to wear her hairdryer. Ibn Shirin said that This indicates her closeness to a good person, God willing. A divorced woman who asks someone she does not know before letting her hair dry. Here, Imam Al-Sadiq confirmed that this is her call to the one who will end her problems and protect her from them. If a divorced woman sees herself doing her hair with a hair dryer at home, this vision expresses About the end of her lifeâ€™s problems and trying to get rid of them. The divorced woman looks at her divorced wife combing her hair in a dream with a hairdryer. Here, scholars and commentators have confirmed that she will return to her husband again, God willing. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about long hair for a pregnant woman. Interpretation of seeing a hairdryer in a dream for a man and its meaning if A man saw in a dream that he was combing his hair with a hairdryer at home in a dream. The vision shows that there were problems that he was going through and living in his life at the moment. He also said that a man was combing his hair and combing his hair in a dream. Ibn Shirin explained this for the new life that he will live in And he will accept it at this time. A man looks at a hair dryer in a dream and wants to comb his hair with it in a dream. The meaning indicates the end of the matter that is bothering this dreamer in his life at this time. Either the dreamer sees in a dream that he sees an unknown person combing his hair for him. .wedel

title: Interpretation of a dream about a divorced woman cutting her hair in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a divorced woman cutting her hair in a dream in case you are looking for what it means. Interpretation of a dream about a divorced woman cutting her hair in a dream. In the following lines we present all of this and more. Interpretation of a dream about a divorced woman cutting her hair in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a divorced woman cutting her hair in a dream. A dream may lead to her high status, and God has all knowledge. When a divorced woman sees her hair cut, this may be a sign of goodness and nourishment, and God knows the unseen. If a divorced woman sees herself cutting her hair, this may be obtaining an inheritance, and God is Most High and Most Knowing, while if a divorced woman sees her hair cut while it is thin. And short, this may be a sign of overcoming problems and worries, God willing. Interpretation of a dream in which a divorced woman sings in a dream. Interpretation of a dream in which a divorced woman sings in a dream can lead to trouble, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of dreams that a divorced woman sings happily in a dream, it could be a sign of Someone wants to marry her, and God knows the unseen. When a divorced woman sees strangers harassing her in a dream, this may be a sign that she is getting rid of problems and that God is Most High and All-Knowing. If a divorced woman hears screaming and does not know who is divorcing her, this may lead to her being saved from problems, and God knows the unseen. If a divorced woman sees Happy flies in her house in a dream, this may be evidence of solving big problems and God has all the knowledge. Interpretation of a dream in which a divorced woman cries in a dream. Interpretation of a dream in which a divorced woman cries in a dream could be a sign of kindness, and God knows best. Seeing a divorced woman crying can mean comfort, and God knows best. The unseen: When you see a divorced woman crying loudly in a dream, it may be a sign of trouble, and God knows best. While the vision of a divorced woman crying may represent marriage, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about a divorced woman talking to her ex-husband in a dream. If a divorced woman sees her ex-husbandâ€™s responsibility, this may lead to love for him, and God knows the unseen. If a divorced woman is seen talking to her ex-husband, it may express some of the problems she is going through, and God knows best. It may indicate psychological pressure. What you are suffering from, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream that a divorced woman is pregnant in a dream. Seeing a divorced woman being pregnant from her ex-husband expresses her longing for him, and God knows the unseen. If a divorced woman sees pregnancy, this may indicate that she returns to her ex-wife, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a divorced woman returning to her ex-husband in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a divorced woman returning to her ex-husband in a dream could be a sign of solving problems, God willing. title: Interpretation of the leg in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: In the following paragraphs, we present to you in detail the most important things presented by the great scholar Muhammad Ibn Sirin in interpreting the leg in a dream: The leg is a part of the human body and is used for walking and movement. Sometimes the sleeper sees in his dream a sprain in his leg, or he sees it in bad condition, or he sees a strange shape of his fingers, so he is afraid of this dream and does not know whether this vision is a sign. That it refers to or that they are just dreams that have no meaning, and that is why we will show you in the following article from the Encyclopedia of Interpretation of seeing feet in a dream for a single girl, a married woman, and also a man. Interpretation of a leg in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The great scholar Muhammad Ibn Sirin believes that a twisted leg in a dream indicates a separation. The dreamer is about the beloved. And if the sleeper sees in his dream that his feet rise to the sky, this is a sign of the death of the father, and only God knows the timings. And if the dreamer sees in a dream that his leg is cut off, this is a sign of the material loss that he will suffer. Seeing more than one toe indicates Usually, this increases the influence and power of the viewer. Leg pain or leg deformity in a dream indicates the presence of many fantasies in the dreamerâ€™s life. Seeing feet in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation scholars believe that a strong leg in an unmarried girlâ€™s dream indicates that the dreamer is a religious girl seeking to please her Lord. Seeing a crooked leg in an unmarried girlâ€™s dream indicates her relationship with a man who will make her suffer in her life. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that her leg is broken, this is a sign that she is going through a bad psychological state. And seeing hair appearing on the legs in an unmarried girlâ€™s dream indicates This girl is trying to achieve her dreams and is on the right path. But if she sees her leg hair in her dream and feels terrified by seeing it, this is a sign that something bad will happen to her. If an unmarried girl sees her leg hair in her dream and falls in love with it, this is an unpleasant vision and indicates her marriage. From a man she does not love. Seeing the legs in a dream of a married woman. Seeing the left leg in a married womanâ€™s dream indicates that this woman has a good heart and that her intentions are always good in relationships with people. If a married woman sees in a dream the hair on her legs, this indicates the coming of sorrows and bad news. Good news or deteriorating financial conditions and accumulation of debts. If a married woman sees in her dream that her leg is cut off, this is a sign of a dispute with her husband or the death of someone close to her, and only God knows the time. Seeing blood on a married womanâ€™s feet in a dream indicates that she is married to an unmarried man. Faithful. Interpretation of a leg in a dream for a man. Dream interpretation scholars say that if someone sees in a dream that he has more than two legs, then this is a good vision that portends him success at work and obtaining a large financial income. If you see a burned leg in a manâ€™s dream, this means that his situation will change For the better. If the man in the dream is sick and sees in a dream that he has three legs, then this is an unpleasant vision that indicates the difficulty of getting rid of this disease. If the dreamer is single and sees in a dream that he is walking with a broken leg, then this is a sign of marriage.

If you see a burned leg in a manâ€™s dream, this means that his situation will change For the better. If the man in the dream is sick and sees in a dream that he has three legs, then this is an unpleasant vision that indicates the difficulty of getting rid of this disease. If the dreamer is single and sees in a dream that he is walking with a broken leg, then this is a sign of marriage.

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a bed in a dream in detail

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a bed in a dream in detail. Interpretation of dreams of seeing a bed or a furnished bed in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The face of the bed in the dream indicates the husband and the back of the bed indicates the wife. And whoever sees himself in a dream sitting on an unfamiliar bed with a mattress on it, he will meet the king. Or he will be promoted to a higher council and get married if he is single. And a clearer son will be born to him, for you are his wife with the child. And whoever sees in a dream a bed with a mattress on it, he will be mentioned, high and exalted among the hypocrites. Whoever sees himself sitting on an unfamiliar bed without a mattress will die, especially if he is sick or traveling, and whoever sees himself sitting with a woman on a bed in a dream, he will be happy with this woman, and perhaps this will come between them. Anyone who sees a bed without a mattress in a dream. He will travel. It explains the bed and everything that a person sleeps in a dream with the dreamerâ€™s wife and what she has. It indicates everything that satisfies a person and everything that leads a person, such as a woman, a ship, or a coffin. Interpretation of a dream about a bed in a single girlâ€™s dream. If you see a bed in a dream, this indicates To an unmarried woman or an unmarried girl. About the approach to marriage, as the bed is a symbol of the husband in one dream. For an unmarried woman to see in her sleep, a clean, tidy, and comfortable bed, indicates the high status of the groom and his respect for her in the future. If the bed that she saw was unclean And it is not tidy, this indicates that the groom is not worthy of her. It is not of her level for the only girl to see in her dream a clean white bed. This indicates that this groom has an important job and a prestigious position, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a bed in a married womanâ€™s dream. The bed in a married womanâ€™s dream It indicates her status with her husband. If this bed was clean and tidy, this indicates the extent of her husbandâ€™s love, honesty, and respect for her. Conversely, if the bed he saw was unclean and untidy, this is a sign of future problems between them, and God knows best. The bed in a pregnant womanâ€™s dream is either something the woman sees A pregnant woman is on a bed in her dream, or she is sitting on the bed. This is an indication of the sex of her fetus, which means that her vision of a narrow bed means that she will give birth to a male child. A wide bed means that she will give birth to a female child. And God knows best, because He alone knows what is in the wombs, and He knows what every child gives birth to. Female. Seeing yourself sitting on a bed in a dream. For a person who dreams that he is sitting on a bed, if this person is single, he will get married soon. If he is married, then God will honor him with a male child. As for seeing him sitting on a white bed in a dream, this indicates the recovery of the sick person. And his happiness, contentment, comfort, and reassurance. In general, scholars said that seeing him sitting on a bed in a dream. It is a sign of the end of problems and their solution and the beginning of a life free of worries and sorrows. And full of joy, joy, and gladness, and God knows best. As for the vision of sleeping in an unknown or strange bed, it means travel or abundance. A vision

title: Interpretation of going to the hospital in a dream

preview.html: What is the interpretation of going to the hospital in a dream? Many people search for an interpretation of a dream in the hospital, as the dreamer feels anxious and terrified by this vision, which has led scientists to interpret many interpretations of the dream, knowing that they differ from one case to another, and below through above. The website will provide you with more details. Read also: Bathing in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about a hospital in a dreamSeeing a hospital in a dream is good news, because jurists interpreted seeing it in a dream as a way out of the crises and pressures that the dreamer is suffering from, and others concluded that they see it as the fulfillment of dreams and desires, but if The vision was associated with discharge from the hospital, as it indicated recovery from illness and disease. Interpretation of seeing a hospital in a dream indicates good conditions in many areas of life such as marriage, travel, childbirth, etc. Seeing a young unmarried student using drugs is evidence of the useful knowledge that the student is receiving. Seeing a needle taken for a married woman in the hospital is evidence of improving the family situation, If this vision is for a pregnant woman, it is evidence of the ease of her birth. But if the girl is single, she will be happy to marry a good man. Seeing a merchant in a hospital in a dream indicates the fear of loss and losing everything he has achieved. Read also: Pregnancy in a dream. Interpretation of Imam Nabulsiâ€™s vision of the hospital in a dream. In the process of searching for an explanation for going to the hospital, Al-Nabulsi interpreted this vision with a number of clues, the most important of which are the following: The expert Al-Nabulsi mentioned that when a person sees the hospital while he is sleeping, this indicates that that person is afraid of illness from within. It also indicates an imminent solution to a problem, It should also be noted that the hospital in the dream is close to treating a disease that was treated a long time ago. It also indicates the presence of good deeds if the dreamer is not married and God Almighty is Most High and Most Knowing. But if a person sees in his dream that he is visiting a patient in the hospital, this indicates That his life will take a positive turn. Or it indicates the love of the dreamerâ€™s heart for whoever visits him if he knows him, and if he does not know him, then it is a sign of tremendous goodness. In general, visiting hospitals is a sign of goodness, nourishment, success, and happiness, God willing. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about giving birth to Asami. Interpretation of a dream about sleeping in a bed The Hospital by Ibn Sirin The scholar Muhammad Ibn Sirin is one of the most famous dream interpreters. His performances have always been admired by many people. Among the most prominent indicators of this vision are the following: Seeing sleeping in a hospital bed in a dream is a sign of delusion, and establishing professional and practical relationships promises success. This happens if the dreamer sleeps comfortably in a hospital bed and does not feel tired or exhausted, and vice versa, if sleeping in a bed Uncomfortable, as this is a sign of failure, disappointment, and problems at work and practical life. Read also: Penguin in a dream. The most prominent interpretations of the hospital dream for a married and pregnant woman. There are many different interpretations about seeing the hospital in a dream for a pregnant and married woman that scholars have agreed upon, including:

title: The most famous +11 interpretations of the presence of a crocodile in a dream for single and married women

preview.html: The meaning of the presence of a crocodile for single people: It carries the meaning of the presence of a crocodile in the dream of an unmarried girl or an unmarried woman. There are many interpretations and connotations, most of which are frightening. Seeing a crocodile in a studentâ€™s dream indicates a great deal of fear of the academic year, exams, stress and tension. Seeing a crocodile in an unmarried girlâ€™s dream symbolizes To her fear and anxiety about the future and the responsibility that falls on her. Seeing a crocodile in an unmarried girlâ€™s dream indicates fear of marriage, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Seeing a crocodile chasing an unmarried girl in a dream is a sign of problems and obstacles in her life. As for seeing an unmarried girl in a dream As she escapes from being chased by crocodiles, this means escaping distress, worries, and heartache, God willing. The meaning of the presence of a crocodile for a married woman: Seeing a crocodile in a married womanâ€™s dream indicates problems, disagreements, and obstacles in her life. Seeing a crocodile chasing a married woman in a dream symbolizes many marital problems and family disputes. Seeing yourself escaping from being chased by crocodiles in a married womanâ€™s dream means getting rid of problems, worries, and heartaches. The meaning of the presence of a crocodile for a pregnant woman. Seeing a crocodile in a pregnant womanâ€™s dream is a sign that God will bless her with a male child, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Seeing a crocodile being caressed in a pregnant womanâ€™s dream indicates However, she will give birth soon easily and smoothly, God willing. But seeing a crocodile being chased in a pregnant womanâ€™s dream is better not to interpret it because it is an unpleasant vision. Seeing her escaping from being chased by crocodiles in a pregnant womanâ€™s dream symbolizes salvation from the troubles and pain of pregnancy. The meaning of the presence of a crocodile for a man: seeing a crocodile in a dream A dream indicates forbidden money, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Seeing a crocodile in a manâ€™s dream indicates fear of the future. Seeing a crocodile in a manâ€™s dream symbolizes fear of betrayal by enemies. title: Interpretation of seeing someone who hates me in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing someone who hates me in a dream by seeing roy2a.com Seeing someone who hates me in a dream indicates hostility and hatred on the part of some of those around him, as well as conspiracies and reconciliation. He hates me in a dream for a married man, an unmarried young man, an unmarried girl, as well as a married woman, as well as a divorced woman and a widow, and by providing interpretations of leading interpreters, seeing a person running after me in a dream, visions and dreams is interpreted, the example of Imam Muhammad bin Sirin in the past and scholars of interpretation and visions In the modern era, so follow us on the vision website. What is the interpretation of seeing a person who hates me in a dream according to Imam Ibn Sirin? Seeing a person who shows hatred and hostility towards the monarch in a dream indicates the presence of a person who is trying to harm the fortuneteller or a problem that he will face. Seeing a stranger who hates the dreamer in a dream indicates On bad morals and mistreatment of those who enter, and the vision may indicate his lack of integrity and shortcomings in worship. Seeing reconciliation with someone you hate in a dream means reconciliation between them and may indicate the subconscious mindâ€™s preoccupation with him and the fear of reconciliation with that person. See also: Interpretation of seeing someone He sprays me with water in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing someone who hates me in a dream for a single woman? To dream of reconciling with someone she hates in a dream for a single girl indicates a good attitude, repentance of sins, a good biography, and good morals. If an unmarried girl sees someone who hates her and ignores her in a dream , this means that she will be hurt and harmed by some people and exposed to conspiracies. If a girl sees someone she hates without talking to him, this means problems that the girl faces, difficulties and experiences. See also: Interpretation of seeing someone urinating in a dream What is the dream of seeing someone who hates me on a married woman? To see someone who hates you reconciling with you in a dream for a married woman means repentance from sins, righteousness, obedience to God, happiness, and stability in marriage. If a married woman sees someone who hates her, this indicates the problems and anxiety she faces and may indicate that she is being deceived and cheated by some friends or neighbors. If a married woman sees a stranger who hates her, this indicates the problems and tribulations she faces. What is the interpretation of seeing someone who hates me in a dream about a pregnant woman? A dream about a pregnant woman who hates her and hates her indicates the problems that the mother will face during pregnancy and childbirth. If a pregnant woman sees someone who hates her and reconciles with her, this It indicates the ease of childbirth and the cessation of pain and misfortunes. See also: The interpretation of seeing someone calling me in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing someone who hates me in a dream for a divorced woman? Seeing an end to disagreement with a quarrel in a divorced womanâ€™s dream indicates that her affairs will ease, her situation will be fine, and she will achieve what she wanted. Because it indicates peace in reality. If a divorced woman sees someone who hates her in reality talking to her in a dream, this indicates the death of problems and worries, her good condition, and her integrity in Godâ€™s commandments. What is the interpretation of a dream about someone who hates your love? Seeing someone quarreling with you and hating you indicates remorse and contemplation. Self of his actions. If you see someone who hates your love, this indicates the collapse of worries

title: Interpretation of seeing geese in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of seeing geese in a dream via the website roy2a.com. Seeing geese in a dream means obtaining money, a prestigious job, marital and family stability, hearing good news, as well as pregnancy for a married woman and giving birth to a daughter for a pregnant woman, and providing interpretations of the great imams in interpreting dreams and visions such as Imam Muhammad Ibn Sirin, Imam Al-Sadiq, Ibn Kathir, Al-Nabulsi and other interpreters of ancient and modern times, so follow us on his website to find out the interpretation of seeing geese in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing geese in a dream according to Imam Ibn Sirin? Seeing geese in a dream indicates a lot of goodness, joy and pleasure. Seeing black geese indicates bad news and sadness. If a married man sees that he has measles in a dream, it indicates that he will obtain a prestigious job and financial stability. Seeing goose eggs in a dream indicates hearing good news and an abundance of good things in the dreamerâ€™s life. Seeing geese for a married woman in In a dream, she remembers that she gave birth to a son. See also: Interpretation of seeing watermelon in a dream. If an unmarried girl sees goose feathers in a dream, it indicates the approach of her marriage, and seeing geese flying in the sky indicates her travels. If a pregnant woman sees white geese, it indicates the birth of a beautiful woman, as well as the abundance of sustenance and the abundance of goodness in her life. A dream about a young goose for a married woman indicates abundance of goodness and luxury of life.
